content:
About I am a Ph.D. student in Computer Science at NYU AI4CE Lab, advised by Prof. Chen Feng. Before that, I obtained my B.Sc. in Mathematics from New York University and NYU Shanghai.
My research interest lies in the intersection of computer vision and robot perception. In my research, I aim to develop large reconstruction models to build digital twins of the real-world, foundational world models that simulate dynamic environments, and generalist policy models based on model predictive control.

[2024-09] MSG is accepted to NeurIPS 2024.
[2024-07] Occ4cast and SSCBench are accepted to IROS 2024.
ðŸ“£ I'm always happy to collaborate with self-motivated UG/MS student on my exciting research projects. If you are interested, please directly send me an email with your resume and interest.
summary: About I am a Ph.D. student in Computer Science at NYU AI4CE Lab, advised by Prof. Chen Feng. Before that, I obtained my B.Sc. in Mathematics from New York University and NYU Shanghai.
title: Xinhao Liu
CityWalker: Learning Embodied Urban Navigation from Web-Scale Videos
Occ4cast: LiDAR-based 4D Occupancy Completion and Forecasting
SSCBench: Monocular 3D Semantic Scene Completion Benchmark in Street Views
DeepMapping2: Self-Supervised Large-Scale LiDAR Map Optimization
Self-supervised visual place recognition by mining temporal and feature neighborhoods
